name: Knight
message: Well it seems like I found the rat that have been steeling in this zone

name: Ragged child
message: A knight? here, in the rathole? you came to tax our people, dont you?

name: Knight
message: And what if I did? it's part of my job as knight of the city

name: Knight
message: Now, I heard that you stole something from this lady...

name: Knight
message: Of course is my duty to get that back to her, for the right price

name: Knight
message: And I think I already know what I want from this lady...

name: Traveler
message: This is not necessary Sir, I just borrowed him my purse

name: Knight
message: Ha ha ha, you wont trick me...

name: Ragged child
message: Get away from here! I wont give you nothing

name: Knight
message: Oh it doesn't matter if you want kid, I will take it from you

name: Knight
message: And if you cry it's better, I love when the rats screams before getting caught

name: Knight
message: Do not interfere, or you will be next

name: ERROR
message: If you are seeing this message something went bad
